original_text: And the ambush arose quickly out of their place, and they ran as soon as he had stretched out his hand: and they entered into the city, and took it, and hasted and set the city on fire.
korean_text: 그의 손을 드는 순간에 복병이 그들의 자리에서 급히 일어나 성읍으로 달려 들어가서 점령하고 곧 성읍에 불을 놓았더라

sentences.original_text: And the ambush arose quickly out of their place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 매복자들이 그들의 곳에서 신속히 일어나

sentences.original_text: and they ran as soon as he had stretched out his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 손을 뻗자마자 그들이 달려갔고

sentences.original_text: and they entered into the city
and hasted and set the city on fire
